# README
- This is the code for Dictionary Creation.
  - The created dictionary is saved as an RDS object that can then be imported into other files for             application.
  
- It includes some basic testing code to make sure the dictionary is working but for full or additional applied analysis of the dictionary, check file CRPD_Stream1.Rmd; Part 3: Dictionary Analysis.


```{r Load Packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(quanteda)
```
